amend-postcode.label: Postcode (optional)
amend-postcode.hint: Postcode is optional if your address is outside the UK

amend-country.label: Country of address
amend-country.hint: Select a country from the list

amend-phone-number.label: Contact phone number
amend-phone-number.hint: For international numbers, include the country code

amend-email.label: Email address
amend-email.hint: Where we will contact you about the outcome of your application

amend-name-options.legend: Do you need to amend your name on the licence?

amend-new-date-name-changed.legend: What date did you change your name?

amend-applicant-Id-type.legend: Which identity document do you want to use?
amend-applicant-Id-type.hint: If your licence is granted, you will need to show this document when buying the substances

EU-passport.label: Passport from the EU, Switzerland, Norway, Iceland or Liechtenstein

amend-Uk-driving-licence-number.label: What is your driving licence number?
amend-Uk-driving-licence-number.hint: On section 5 of your licence, for example MORGA657054SM9IJ

amend-home-address-options.legend: Do you need to amend your home address on the licence?

amend-new-postcode.label: Postcode (optional)
amend-new-postcode.hint: Postcode is optional if your address is outside the UK

amend-new-date-moved-to-address.legend: What date did you change your address?

amend-change-substances-options.legend: Do you need to amend the substances on your licence?

amend-countersignatory-years.label: How many years have you known your countersignatory?
amend-countersignatory-years.hint: They must have known you for at least 2 years

amend-countersignatory-howyouknow.label: How do you know your countersignatory?

amend-countersignatory-phone-number.label: Contact phone number
amend-countersignatory-phone-number.hint: For international numbers, include the country code

amend-regulated-explosives-precursors.legend: Do you need to amend the explosives precursors on your licence?

amend-why-need-precursor.label: {{values.whyNeedPrecursorLabel}}
amend-why-need-precursor.hint: Detailed answers mean we can process your application faster

amend-how-much-precursor.label: How much do you wish to acquire at any one time?
amend-how-much-precursor.hint: Enter the amount and the unit. For example, 10 litres

amend-what-concentration-precursor.label: What concentration % w/w do you need?

amend-where-to-store-precursor.hint: This must be in the UK

amend-where-to-use-precursor.hint: This must be in the UK

amend-countersignatory-Id-type.legend: Which identity document do you want to use?
amend-countersignatory-Id-type.hint: If your licence is granted, you will need to show this document when buying the substances

EU-passport.label: Passport from the EU, Switzerland, Norway, Iceland or Liechtenstein

amend-countersignatory-Uk-driving-licenc.label: What is your driving licence number?
amend-countersignatory-Uk-driving-licenc.hint: On section 5 of your licence, for example MORGA657054SM9IJ

amend-declaration.label: I have read and agree to this declaration
